description:
Course : Using Splunk for Analytics

Benefits : After completing this course you will be able to understand the basic concepts to use Splunk Enterprise for Analytics.

Delivery: Online

Agenda : Learn the fundamentals of the most poular Data Analytics technology.This power-user course will teach you to search, navigate, tag, build alerts and create simple reports with Splunk. It's recommended for anyone who needs to look at IT data - from help desk staff to systems administrators and developers.Students can learn how to create searches, create reports, create and use pivots & macros.

Target Audience: System Administrators, Security Administrators, Security Analysts, Data Analysts

Pre-Requisites : Windows & Linux/Unix OS Administration; Basics of TCP/IP and Networking

Lab Access & Lab Guide : Not Included
title: Using Splunk for Big Data Analytics
